INSTANCE.name: self-service
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:15cm y:12cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:2
The self-service consists of reapir space rental and diagnosis.

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:15.5cm y:8.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:3

INSTANCE.name: Charlie's aircrafts
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:30.5cm y:27.5cm w:3cm h:1.5cm index:19

The main company building is devided in three areas: back office, client waiting area and service center. All three parts are located on the company area, but they are physically devided, as it is very loud in the service center and the back office employees have to be concentrated for the billing.

After choosing a tool, an interaction between the customer/mechanic, the tool and the diagnosis takes place.

INSTANCE.name: technology occupied
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:3.5cm y:9.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:97

A customer can book all tools and machines in the companies repair center. If he/she decides to use a tool, it is blocked for other customers. This may be implemented with RDF tags or QR codes, which define user and time.

INSTANCE.name: diagnosis sheet
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:10.5cm y:9.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:98

INSTANCE.name: service center
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:10.5cm y:7.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:99

INSTANCE.name: service cataloge
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:19.5cm y:12cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:107

The service catalogue has more than the two assigned services, but these are the main ones. The billing is important for all other subservices and the self-service is the new business model in Peter's company.

INSTANCE.name: save capital for investments
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:26.5cm y:2cm w:3.2cm h:1.6cm index:109

INSTANCE.name: expand resource pool
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:25.5cm y:20cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:111
Peter wants to hire new IT staff and he would like to invest in new tools and machines for the self-service in order to get more customers.

TO.instance: decrease costs from classical business model

INSTANCE.name: aircrafts webpage
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:14cm y:7cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:2
The webpage is usually controlled once a month, therefore the valid until date is set to the beginning of a month, so that it is updated regularly.

The webpage offers various kinds of information: history, booking, ... Furthermore, all important contact data is provided. Customers can find the mail address, the phone number and the location details.

INSTANCE.name: webservice interface
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:14cm y:9.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:3

INSTANCE.name: customer database
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:9.5cm y:12.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:4
The database should be valid for a long time, so a consistent data stock can be built up.

INSTANCE.name: billing
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:19cm y:12.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:5

The billing is valid for a year, as new laws are often published at the beginning of a year.
If there are regulations during the year, like the cash register guideline, they have to be implemented immediately.

INSTANCE.name: provision of services
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:14cm y:12.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:6

INSTANCE.name: digitalize customer sheets
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:9.5cm y:16cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:10
This event takes about 9 minutes and 30 seconds for each customer sheet.

INSTANCE.name: support advertising
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:5cm y:16cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:11

INSTANCE.name: relevant customer data
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:9.5cm y:20cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:12

INSTANCE.name: type in new customers
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:2cm y:14cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:13

INSTANCE.name: database update
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:5cm y:9cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:14

INSTANCE.name: create new customer
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:2cm y:11cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:15

INSTANCE.name: individual
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:9.5cm y:23cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:19

INSTANCE.name: company
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:5cm y:20cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:20

INSTANCE.name: group options
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:5cm y:23cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:21

INSTANCE.name: request package
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:14cm y:4.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:26
This event usually takes approximately 15 minutes.

If the customer decides to book a package, either on phone, directly in the office, by web form or via mail, the new request has to be entered into the application. The application user has to enter the data.

INSTANCE.name: obtain confirmation
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:9.5cm y:3cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:27

INSTANCE.name: send mail to customer
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:5.5cm y:3cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:28

INSTANCE.name: set up customer database
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:9.5cm y:6cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:29

INSTANCE.name: prepare service for customer
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:1.5cm y:3cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:30

INSTANCE.name: generate customer entry
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:5.5cm y:6cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:31

INSTANCE.name: supply package
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:1.5cm y:6cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:32
As a good business developes new services regularly, the collaboration is valid for only one year.

INSTANCE.name: customer data
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:18.5cm y:4.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:38

INSTANCE.name: personal
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:18.5cm y:1.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:39
The data object dealing with personal data contains: 1) name of customer 2) address of customer 3) contact details

INSTANCE.name: orders
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:18.5cm y:7.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:41
This data object includes: 1) chosen packages 2) chosen invoicing (online, offline) 3) chosen options

INSTANCE.name: notes
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:23cm y:4.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:40
The customer can have special wishes or questions, which are contained in this data object.

INSTANCE.name: review mechanisms
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:18.5cm y:9.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:45
The review mechanism is not valid for a long time, as it should be improved further.

The customers are possible to review their experiences on the webpage or with a printed form in the office. Until now, the reviews are only collected. Future improvements could be that Peter can analyse them with services and functions provided by the application.

INSTANCE.name: combine old and new customers
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:9.5cm y:9cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:47

INSTANCE.name: company creates bill
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:23cm y:12.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:51

INSTANCE.name: company gets bill
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:16.5cm y:15cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:53
The company gets bills only from suppliers. They are used in the long-run, as the company is satisfied with them.

INSTANCE.name: create direct debit for IBAN
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:16.5cm y:17cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:55
All direct debit suppliers have to be controlled once a year (regarding business failure, ...).

This step process step can be neglegted, if the company got any bills from the supplier before.
This step is only relevant for new suppliers.

INSTANCE.name: remove from bank account
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:13.5cm y:19.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:56
This process will not change a lot, therefore it is valid for a long time.
This application process step is automatically conducted. Therefore, no user has to interact, as the bank works as a broker between supplier and company.

INSTANCE.name: connect to mail program
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:20cm y:20cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:57

INSTANCE.name: online (signate)
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:20cm y:17.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:58
There are new signation methods, as security is getting more important.

INSTANCE.name: offline (print)
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:23.5cm y:17.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:59
Valid only one year, because it is likely that printed bills are outdated some day.
If the customer wants to pay directly in the office, following interaction with the post office is left out. The bill is directly handed over to the customer and he/she can pay cash.

INSTANCE.name: control if invoice sent
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:20cm y:22.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:60

INSTANCE.name: provide invoicing
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:23cm y:15cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:61

INSTANCE.name: list all bills from month
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:13.5cm y:24.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:62

INSTANCE.name: provide sort of control
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:13.5cm y:22cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:63

INSTANCE.name: success message
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:20cm y:25cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:64

INSTANCE.name: mail to post office
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:23.5cm y:20cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:78
The application notifies the postman, so that he knows, there are some letters he has to pick up the next time he has to come to the company or latest the next day.

INSTANCE.name: customer review
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:22cm y:9.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:81

INSTANCE.name: tourist guide
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:19.5cm y:18.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:13
As it is possible that there are different guides for tourist groups, there is no assigned actor.
The tourist guide is not needed every day. Tourists from abroad are not coming everyday. Therefore, the employment is regulated. The guide comes, when his/her special language skills are needed.

INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:3cm y:14.5cm w:8cm h:6.5cm index:3

INSTANCE.name: choose aircraft
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:11.5cm y:24cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:51

INSTANCE.name: choose duration/location
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:15.5cm y:24cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:52
The location depends a little bit on the chosen aircraft. As flights over cities are more common and easier with helicopters. Furthermore, the wind is relevant for sailplanes.

INSTANCE.name: choose tourist guide
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:19.5cm y:24cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:53
This is an optional process part. If no guide is chosen, the pilot tries his/her best to explain the sights.

INSTANCE.name: enjoy flight with customers
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:15.5cm y:27cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:54

INSTANCE.name: sort out task
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:25cm y:22.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:55

INSTANCE.name: help customer
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:31.5cm y:22.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:56

Mechanis can be booked on hourly basis.
The customer is allowed to use the tools and machines provided by the company.

INSTANCE.name: repair on own
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:30cm y:25cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:57
There are three rapair and service packages offered to the customer. 1) basic: general technical check 2) silver: basic + smaller repairs 3) gold: silver +cleaning and refueling

INSTANCE.name: order rare parts
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:27.5cm y:27.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:58
Another package can be booked: for example the mechanics can after the ordering and receiving of the rare parts build them in the customers plane.

INSTANCE.name: check result
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:33.5cm y:27.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:59
A check should ensure constant quality of the services and avoid accidents because of human mistakes.

INSTANCE.name: find empty place
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:7cm y:21cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:60

INSTANCE.name: bring aircraft of customer there
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:7cm y:26cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:61

INSTANCE.name: discuss options
INSTANCE.ATTRIBUTE: NODE x:7cm y:23.5cm w:2.8cm h:1.4cm index:62

There are additional booking options, like the usage of the runway for take-off and landing. As the storage package is booked, the fee of the options is reduced.
It is also possible to book only the runway usage, but this is not very common, therefore it is not modeled in detail. The difference would be a higher fee for only renting the runway.
